members.member: Can be used if you don't want to move the content but use the found or not found content

members.member: Should be true if file is not a binary one

member.name: P:MudBlazor.Extensions.Components.MudExFileDisplay.ViewDependsOnContentType
member.summary: Set this to false to show everything in iframe/object tag otherwise zip, images audio and video will displayed in correct tags

members.member: A function to handle content error. Return true if you have handled the error and false if you want to show the error message For example you can reset Url here to create a proxy fallback or display own not supported image or what ever. If you reset Url or Data here you need also to reset ContentType
